languages.text: "Мне не нужны пророчества и колдовство, чтобы разглядеть то, что видно даже слепцу. Подумай об этом, элантах. Столь ли ясен твой взор?"
"I have no need of prophecy or sorcery to see what is blindingly obvious. Think about it, elantach. Is your own vision clear?"
languages.original_text: "Мне не нужны пророчества и колдовство, чтобы разглядеть то, что видно даже слепцу. Подумай об этом, элантах. Столь ли ясен твой взор?"

traits.locale_text: "I have no need of prophecy or sorcery to see what is blindingly obvious. Think about it, elantach. Is your own vision all that clear?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have no need of prophecy or sorcery to see what is blindingly obvious. Think about it, elantach. Is your own vision all that clear?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I have no need of prophecy or sorcery to see what is blindingly obvious. Think about it, elantach. Is your own vision clear?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: «No necesito de profecías ni sortilegios para ver lo que hasta un ciego podría ver. Piensa en ello, elantach. ¿Puedes tú ver con claridad?».
languages.original_text: "I have no need of prophecy or sorcery to see what is blindingly obvious. Think about it, elantach. Is your own vision clear?"

traits.locale_text: «No necesito de profecías ni sortilegios para ver lo que hasta un ciego podría ver. Piensa en ello, elantach. ¿Puedes tú ver con claridad?».
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: “这种事情显而易见，我不需要预言或巫术也能看得到。好好想想吧，外界人。你自己的眼界还清晰吗？”
languages.original_text: "I have no need of prophecy or sorcery to see what is blindingly obvious. Think about it, elantach. Is your own vision clear?"

traits.locale_text: “这种事情显而易见，我不需要预言或巫术也能看得到。好好想想吧，外界人。你自己的眼界还清晰吗？”
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'ai pas besoin de présages ni de sorcellerie pour voir l'évidence. Pensez-y, elantach. Votre vision à vous est-elle si claire ? »
languages.original_text: "I have no need of prophecy or sorcery to see what is blindingly obvious. Think about it, elantach. Is your own vision clear?"

traits.locale_text: « Je n'ai pas besoin de présages ni de sorcellerie pour voir l'évidence. Pensez-y, elantach. Votre vision à vous est-elle si claire ? »
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: 「予言も魔術も必要ない。考えてみろ、エランタ。あなた自身のビジョンは明確か？」
languages.original_text: "I have no need of prophecy or sorcery to see what is blindingly obvious. Think about it, elantach. Is your own vision clear?"

traits.locale_text: 「予言も魔術も必要ない。考えてみろ、エランタ。あなた自身のビジョンは明確か？」
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Ich bin nicht auf Prophezeiungen oder Hexerei angewiesen, um zu erkennen, was so blendend offensichtlich ist. Denkt darüber nach, Elantach. Seht auch Ihr wirklich klar?"
languages.original_text: "I have no need of prophecy or sorcery to see what is blindingly obvious. Think about it, elantach. Is your own vision clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin nicht auf Prophezeiungen oder Hexerei angewiesen, um zu erkennen, was so blendend offensichtlich ist. Denkt darüber nach, Elantach. Seht auch Ihr wirklich klar?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion

languages.text: "Apaçık ortada olan bir gerçeği görmek için kehanetlere veya sahirliğe ihtiyacım yok. Bir düşün elantach. Görüşün berrak mı?"
languages.original_text: "I have no need of prophecy or sorcery to see what is blindingly obvious. Think about it, elantach. Is your own vision clear?"

traits.locale_text: "Apaçık ortada olan bir gerçeği görmek için kehanetlere veya sahirliğe ihtiyacım yok. İyi düşün taşın elantach. Senin görün berrak mı?"
traits.speaker: YrlietCompanion
